title: Delightful 2 bdrm apartment in a great neighborhood
description:
Available starting March 1st, March 15th, or April 15th. One year lease, $1650/month*. First, last, and security deposit. Gas/electric are tenants’ responsibility. 2 bedroom/1 bath.
The apartment interiors are bright and airy and living room opens onto a 2nd floor deck for relaxing, dining, or grilling. Apartment has an open kitchen/ dining/ living room layout. Kitchen has a dishwasher, new induction stove, and birch cabinets.  Hardwood floors throughout the apartment. Windows let in lots of light and overlook a large lot next door. Large bedroom is 14’ x 10’10”, Smaller bedroom is 14’ x 8’ (measurements not including doorway and closet). Laundry on site with designated washer/ dryer for tenant use and storage closet in basement. Easy street parking. No smoking in or on premises. Pets considered on case-by-case basis w/refundable pet deposit.
Location, location, location. Walkable neighborhood – a few blocks from library; two parks with playgrounds, spray grounds, and a public pool; Acme and Germantown Ave coffee stores, restaurants, and shops. Super convenient location to public transit: 2 blocks to Sedgwick train station, and a short distance to other train stops and bus routes.  A short drive, bike ride, or easy walk to Chestnut Hill, Mt Airy Village, Wissahickon Park, etc. Close drive to La Salle, Jefferson University, and a short train ride to Temple. Variety of public and private school options in the area.
Prospective tenants should have an interest in being neighborly. Owners live in one of the four apartments. In email of interest, please add a short message about yourself and what interests you about this apartment. Thank you!
*Landlords provide $50 off above listed rental price if tenant subscribes to 100% renewable electricity. (There are a number of providers, including the Energy Co-op, CleanChoice Energy, CleanSky Energy, Inspire, Green Mountain Energy).

description:
Welcome home to this incredible trilevel, new construction 2 Bed 2 Bath rental in the desirable Graduate Hospital neighborhood. Natural sunlight, oversized windows, stunning kitchen, quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances are a few of the faboulous features you will find here. Wide open floor plan and tons of space! One more level up is a gorgeous private rooftop patio with a picturesque view of the city - this is a view you have to see to believe! Just a few blocks from Rittenhouse Square, one block off south street, and walking distance to entertainment, shopping and transportation. Don't miss this one!

With views of Philadelphia's City Hall and just steps away from iconic Philly locations such as the Pennsylvania Convention Center, Reading Terminal Market, and Love Park, One City offers sophisticated luxury in the heart of Philadelphia. One City offers the most discerning residents the ultimate living experience. Inside this historic building, located at 1401 Arch Street, each apartment residence holds unique original features coupled with contemporary sophistication. title: Welcome to 1705 Spruce St! Nestled in the Desirable Rittenhouse Square
description:
Welcome to 1705 Spruce St! Nestled in the desirable Rittenhouse Square neighborhood, these new 2021 full gut-rehabbed apartments offer modern living in a historic district. With construction finalized in 2021, these brand-new units offer high-end appliances, plenty of closet space, and lovely views. With seven (7) available units, there are a variety of floorplans available for those seeking either a studio or 1-bedroom. You won’t have to worry about laundry, as each apartment has access to laundry on the first floor and some select floor-plans offer an in-unit washer/dryer! With so many attractions nearby, this location is the epitome of ideal: steps away from Rittenhouse Park, Starbucks, restaurants, shopping, and so much more. Transportation is a breeze, with countless bus routes around the corner and just a quick stroll to the BSL. We have three featured units at the moment, but you can find the floor-plans for all units throughout this website. For questions or to request a tour, please contact the Philly Home Advisors! Unit 1R is approximately 300 sq ft offering a kitchen with brand new stainless-steel appliances, dishwasher, and quartz countertops. With lots of cabinetry, there is plenty of storage! The bathroom includes a shower/tub combo, new vanity, and gorgeous modern tiling. The bedroom offers a comfortable space, lots of natural lighting, and a nicely sized closet. This 1-bed, 1-bath is offered at $1,395 a month, plus the cost of utilities. Located right outside the unit is the communal laundry, where two (2) sets of free washers and dryers are found for the tenant’s convenience.
1705 Spruce St #2

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with Wood Floors, Dog Spa, Near Stores
description:
This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home at 712 on the 7th floor features large windows that face south and have a Chancellor Street view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home features wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as April 28, 2023!
Apartment Home Features:
* Renovated kitchen and bathroom
* Wood floors
* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 7th floor
* Large south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Granite kitchen counters
* White kitchen cabinets
* All utilities, except cable and internet, are included
Community Amenities:
* Dog spa
* Building on the lovely Rittenhouse Square
* 8,000-square-foot lounge with seating areas, pool table, conference room, and kitchen
* Fitness center
* Yoga studio
* Sauna
* Guest suites
* Package room
* Laundry room on every floor and third floor laundry facility
* Elevator building with front door attendant and front desk concierge
* Online resident portal RentCafe for maintenance requests, rent payments, lease renewals, and more
* On-site maintenance
* Attached valet parking garage! Parking spaces not managed by community, so the cost is separate.
* Bicycle storage
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to retail stores, grocery stores, restaurants, and more! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Tselaine, Anthropologie, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Outdoor Voices, Urban Outfitters, Paper Source, Kitchen Kapers, Salty Paws, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, Marine Layer, CB2, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory Store, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Di Bruno Bros., Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Maxx's Produce, and Spruce Food Market. Dine out at Pietro's, Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pizzeria Vetri, a.kitchen, Veda, The Continental Mid-town, Kura Sushi, Marathon on the Square, Spice Finch, Farina Pasta & Noodle, Max Brenner, Alice Pizza, and Friday Saturday Sunday. Pick up scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Savor a scoop of ice cream from Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Indulge in a churro sundae at El Merkury. Relax with a manicure at Coco Blue Spruce. Have a facial at Rescue Spa. View the collection at The Mütter Museum. Check out the latest exhibition at the Franklin Institute. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday year-round. There is so much to do in this area!

title: 2 BEDROOM APARTMENT - NEW CONSTRUCTION
description:
Live In Luxury at the newest Inclusionary Housing Development in West Philadelphia. With plans to be finish in 2023, the newly constructed property is the best of new amenities and location.
The five-story, mixed-use complex will provide you with an opportunity to live luxuriously in a well-rounded mix of density, sustainability, and affordability. WADE Flats is the first phase of Spak Group's latest Inclusionary Housing Development located in West Philadelphia.
The project team collaborated with local artist Erin Murray on the design of the building's distinct color-blocked facade. Composed as a conceptual representation of Pennsylvania's watershed network, the patterned blue facade brings about a playful vibrancy to the streetscape. At the sidewalk, ample glazing, linearly staggered brick and planted greenery create a rich commercial and pedestrian experience. Inside, the building provides ample amenities, such as an elevator, full-gym, private bike parking and dog park; as well as private residences that feature four-piece designer Quartz kitchens, floor to ceiling windows that allow for significant nature light, exposed ductwork and wood plank flooring.
Available: Spring 2023
ONLY 1st Month & Security Deposit to MOVE IN (qualifications depending).
Wade Flats houses three studios residences; four One-bedroom residences, and several Two-bedroom residences that will not last. Pre-lease before February 15th, 2023 for move-in April 2023 and receive $500.00 off a 13 month Lease.
Live In Luxury at the newest apartment building in West Philadelphia. With plans to be finish in 2023, the new constructed property is the best of new amenities and location, like:
4 Piece Stainless Steel Appliance Set with Dishwasher
10' Kitchen with White Pearl Quartz Countertop and Full Wood Shaker Cabinets
Luxury Plank Flooring
Nextile Wall System with Delta Bathroom Accents
In-Unit Laundry System
Fiberoptics / Fios and Cable Wired
LED Recessed Lighting
Floor to Ceiling Windows with tons of Natural Light
Central Air with Exposed Ductwork
Onsite Gym
In Door Bike Parking with Reserved Parking
Secured Mail Room
Video Buzz-In Security
Furry Family Member Friendly (Dog Park Onsite)
If the building isn't enough, then there is location! Located near Cedar Park and the Baltimore Avenue Corridor, you are footsteps from Baltimore Avenue, park space, public transportation and the amazing amenities of West Philly and University City. Also walking distance to the Post Office, Rite Aid Pharmacy, Emelanie Deli & Grocery, Booker's Restaurant, a full-service Wine and Spirit Store and the many great Restaurants, shops and the nightlife of University City and Baltimore Avenue.
You are also only 5-10 miles from the shopping, gyms and amenities of South Philadelphia and Center City.
Additionally, PARKING IS FREE and there are no restrictions on adjacent streets, like the 800 block of South 53rd and all of Whitby Avenue.
The apartment is also located less than two miles from University of Pennsylvania and a mile from the University of Sciences.
This property is operated by the Spak Group; a Philadelphia based, family-owned boutique real estate company that renovates, owns, and manages its own properties - just like this one!

title: Beautiful Naval Square, 2-story, lower level 3-bed, 2.5 bath end unit
description:
Just Listed for Rent! Beautiful Naval Square, 2-story, lower level 3-bedroom, 2.5 bath end unit with attached garage! Situated down a lovely, lush, landscaped pathway, this well maintained home features a private terrace spanning the entire width of the property. 1st floor: open concept living/dining space, discreet 1/2 bath, expansive kitchen with stainless appliance package, white shaker style cabinetry, stone counters, large pantry & marble backsplash. Abundant built-in storage closets & shelving located in the garage. Neutral paint throughout. Naval Square amenities: concierge, gated community with 24-hour security, state-of-the-art fitness center, heated outdoor pool, ample visitor parking, spacious common room in Biddle Hall (available for private functions). Enjoy the outdoor amenities of the 20-acre park-like setting, including picnic areas, well-kept gardens & mature Sycamore trees. Very close proximity to South Street Bridge, UPenn, CHOP, HUP & Drexel. Exciting restaurants, shops, & cafes located just outside the gates in Graduate Hospital, Fitler Square, & Rittenhouse Square. Brand new Heirloom Market by Giant just steps outside the community!
